subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: Stay Thirsty was made the 5-2 favorite over the winners of the Preakness Stakes (Shackleford), the Belmont Stakes (Ruler on Ice) and the Haskell Invitational (Coil) for Saturday’s Travers Stakes at Saratoga.
snippet: Stay Thirsty was made the 5-2 favorite over the winners of the Preakness Stakes (Shackleford), the Belmont Stakes (Ruler on Ice) and the Haskell Invitational (Coil) for Saturday’s Travers Stakes at Saratoga.
